alert.note: Alert for Brown (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 18 at 11:37AM MDT until August 20 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River at Columbia affecting Brown County. .For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River at Columbia. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, flooding of the lower lying agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:00 PM CDT Friday was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall slowly over the next couple days. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued on Sunday.
